> Tucson Prime knew he had to stick up for Perceptor, and he lifts his head=
 up to Cheetor, Ramulus and Airhammer with a passive yet stoic expression o=
n his face, as would Optimus Prime when passing a message of importance to =
his Comrades.
>
> " Cheetor, Ramulus, Airhammer, I understand your distrust=
 for the opposite faction but as Legacy has exclaimed, Perceptor has more t=
han shown us his loyalty to our faction and if it were not for him, none of=
 us would be getting out of here safely. Not even myself. So, I ask all of =
you to show him the respect, you would show your leader, Lord Elder, and Pr=
imes who have governed before me. Let this be known that it is not a reques=
t, but as a Prime, I am telling you to respect those who have shown the cap=
ability of turning over a new leaf."
>
> Quickstride nodds.
>
> " He's tell=
n' the truth guys, Perceptor's legit."
>
> Straight Shot also gives them a =
thumbs up.
>
> "And if I didn't give a thumbs up then you'd know it's not t=
rue."


Cheetor paused, anger and distrust written clearly on his face, and=

although he's too far away from Tuscon, or anyone still in the pit to
see =
it, it is also in his voice as he responded with a single word,
"FINE!"

Me=
anwhile Ramulus and Airhammer say nothing, although Ramulus grumbled
slight=
ly as he attempted to draw poeple up. However it was impossible
to say whet=
her Ramulus was grumbling about Perecptor about pulling
poeple up by himsel=
f or perhaps about the situation in general,
Ramulus was a grumbler anyway.=


Cheetor came over and began helping Ramulus pull as Airhammer stayed
in t=
he air, acting as security, his sharp sensors keeping a lookout.

With Chee=
tor's help, and hopefully anyone else who was pulled up, it
was easy to pul=
l everyone else out of the pit, even Tuscon, who proved
to be the heaviest =
of them all.

(TAG)

Preston

> Tucson Prime waits for everyone to get out =
safely before making moves to get himself out of the deep hole. He assists =
on holding the cable so is to make it easier for the others to climb out. I=
t was what Optimus Prime would have done, before helping himself out of a t=
ight jam.
>
> " All right, I don't wish to overload anyone, so I will wait =
until everyone else is out safely, before I get out of here myself. I want =
to make sure that no one is left behind."
